section.name: DataCite
section.definition: A published dataset referenced by a DOI and registered with DataCite. The referenced dataset will contain either the odML file itself or the data the odML is annotating.

property.name: language
property.definition: The primary language of the resource. Allowed values are taken from IETF BCP 47, ISO 639-1 language codes.Examples: en, de, fr

property.name: identifierType
property.definition: The type of Identifier.

property.name: identifier
property.definition: The Identifier is a unique string that identifies a resource. For software, determine whether the identifier is for a specific version of a piece of software, (per the Force11 Software Citation Principles), or for all versions. DOI (Digital Object Identifier) registered by a DataCite member. Format should be “10.1234/foo”

property.name: resourceTypeGeneral
property.value: [Audiovisual, Collection, DataPaper, Dataset, Event, Image, InteractiveResource, Model, PhysicalObject, Service, Software, Sound, Text, Workflow, Other]

property.name: subject
property.definition: Subject, keyword, classification code, or key phrase describing the resource.

property.name: subjectScheme
property.definition: The name of the subject scheme or classification code or authority if one is used.

property.name: schemeURI
property.definition: The URI of the subject identifier scheme.

property.name: valueURI
property.definition: The URI of the subject term.

section.name: dates
section.definition: Different dates relevant to the work.

property.name: date
property.definition: YYYY,YYYY-MM-DD, YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssTZD or any other format or level of granularity described in W3CDTF24. Use RKMS-ISO860125standard for depicting date ranges.Example: 2004-03-02/2005-06-02.Years before 0000 must be prefixed with a -sign,e.g. -0054 to indicate 55 BC.

property.name: dateType
property.definition: The type of date. If Date is used, dateType is mandatory.
property.value: [Accepted, Available, Copyrighted, Collected, Created, Issued, Submitted, Updated, Valid, Withdrawn, Other]

property.name: dateInformation
property.definition: Specific information about the date, if appropriate.

section.name: DataCiteAuthor 1
section.definition: Information about an author as required by DataCite.

property.name: FirstName
property.definition: The authors first Name (John).

property.name: LastName
property.definition: The authors last name (Doe).

property.name: Affiliation
property.definition: Affiliation of the author [Institute, City, Country]

property.name: Id
property.definition: Any Id that is capable of identifying the author e.g. ORCID

section.name: DataCiteReference 1
section.definition: A publication the published dataset is referencing.

property.name: DOI
property.definition: DOI to the referenced publication

property.name: RefType
property.definition: refType might be: IsCitedBy, IsSupplementTo, IsReferencedBy, IsPartOf for further valid types see https://schema.datacite.org/meta/kernel-4

property.name: PublictionCitation
property.definition: Full citation of the reference publication

section.name: DataReferenceDescription
section.definition: Description of a data reference. This Section is defined to be used as a subsection of the 'DataReference' type sections.

property.name: Title
property.definition: Title of the published dataset.

property.name: Description
property.definition: Abstract of the published dataset.

property.name: Funding
property.definition: List of grants the published dataset was funded by.

property.name: Keywords
property.definition: List of keywords describing the published dataset.

section.name: License
section.definition: Description of the license for data / software.

property.name: Name
property.definition: A name of the license.

property.name: LicenseURL
property.definition: URL of the license.
